com.javax0.jdsl.analyzers

Class ListAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javax0.jdsl.analyzers.SpaceIgnoringAnalyzer
      • com.javax0.jdsl.analyzers.ListAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Analyzer, Rule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoExecutorListAnalyzer

    public class ListAnalyzer
extends SpaceIgnoringAnalyzer
    Implements an analyzer that accepts a code if the underlying analyzers accept the starts of the input one after the other.

    If there is any skipping analyzer defined then it is used before the list, between the list elements and after the list.

    Author:
    Peter Verhas

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListAnalyzer

        public ListAnalyzer(Factory<ListExecutor> listExecutorFactory)
        Set the executor that will be returned by the analysis. During the analysis this executor will be furnished with the underlying executors from the result of the analysis performed by the list elements.
